text: ‘‘ (unnitam irukkum porulkalai ellam allahve unakkuk kotuttan. Akave) allah unakku kotuttiruppatil (tanam ceytu) marumai vittait tetikkol. Im'maiyil (tanam ceytu ni tetik kontatutan) un pakam enpatai ni marantuvitate! Allah unakku(k kotuttu) utavi ceytavaru atai(k kontu pirarukku) niyum (tanam ceytu) utavi cey. Pumiyil ni visamam ceyya virumpate! Enenral, visamikalai niccayamaka allah virumpuvatillai'' enrum kurinarkal
